fields.label: Contract
fields.name: REVVY__Contract__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID of the contract that this contract item belongs to.

fields.label: Mark-up (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__Adjustment1Absolute__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Absolute value of Adjustment 1

fields.label: Mark-up Type
fields.name: REVVY__Adjustment1Type__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Determines whether the Adjustment 1 is based on percentage  (e.g., 20%) or on an absolute amount(e.g., $100).

fields.label: Mark-up (%)
fields.name: REVVY__Adjustment1__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Percent value of Adjustment 1

fields.label: Auto Discount (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__AutoDiscountAbsolute__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Auto discount off of list price with manual adjustment (e.g., $100 off auto discount + $100 manual so total $200), calculated by adjustment rules.

fields.label: Auto Discount Type
fields.name: REVVY__AutoDiscountType__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Determines whether the auto discount is based on percentage off (e.g., 20% off) or on an absolute amount off (e.g., $100 off).

fields.label: Auto Discount (%)
fields.name: REVVY__AutoDiscount__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Percentage auto discount off of list price (e.g., 20% off), calculated by adjustment rules.

fields.label: Billing Frequency
fields.name: REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Whether the product is charged on a recurring basis. A product can be charged one-time, weekly, monthly, or yearly.

fields.label: Product
fields.name: REVVY__CatalogNode__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID of the product associated with this contract item.

fields.label: Contract Solution
fields.name: REVVY__ContractSolution__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID of the solution that this quote item belongs to.

fields.label: Cost
fields.name: REVVY__CostPrice__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Cost Price of a product in contract  item

fields.label: Discount (Absolute)
fields.name: REVVY__DiscountAbsolute__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Total discount off of list price (e.g., $100 off).

fields.label: Discount Type
fields.name: REVVY__DiscountType__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Determines whether the discount is based on percentage off (e.g., 20% off) or on an absolute amount off (e.g., $100 off).

fields.label: Man. Disc. (%)
fields.name: REVVY__Discount__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Percentage discount off of list price (e.g., 20% off).

fields.label: Contract Item ID
fields.name: REVVY__ExtId__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID for this record.

fields.label: Ext. Price
fields.name: REVVY__ExtendedPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Price after discount multiplied by quantity.

fields.label: Has sub lines with no list price.
fields.name: REVVY__HasSubLineWithoutListPrice__c
fields.inlineHelpText: This attribute is set to true only if there is any subline linked to this contract line and the list price on any sub line is null.

fields.label: Recommended
fields.name: REVVY__IsBelowLine__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Flag indicates whether the quote item is a below-the-line recommendation. Items flagged shouldn't be included with final calculations.

fields.label: Is Cost Price System populated
fields.name: REVVY__IsSystemCostPrice__c
fields.inlineHelpText: This attribute is to track if the Cost price was calculated by system or user entered. Value is false for user entered.

fields.label: Is List Price System populated
fields.name: REVVY__IsSystemListPrice__c
fields.inlineHelpText: This attribute is to track if the List price was calculated by system or user entered. Value is false for user entered.

fields.label: Needs Config
fields.name: REVVY__Is_Configuration_Complete__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Flag indicates whether the configuration is complete for a configurable product.

fields.label: Margin (Absolute)
fields.name: REVVY__MarginAbsolute__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Absolute value of the margin

fields.label: Margin Type
fields.name: REVVY__MarginType__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Determines whether the Margin is based on percentage  (e.g., 20%) or on an absolute amount(e.g., $100).

fields.label: Margin ( % )
fields.name: REVVY__Margin__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Percent value of the margin

fields.label: Monthly Mark-up (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyAdjustment1Absolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate adjustment1 on products that are billed on a Monthly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Monthly Mark-up (%)
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyAdjustment1_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Adjustment that is applied to a regular product that is billed Monthly. If the product is configurable, then the Monthly adjustment field is the adjustment on all sub-lines that are billed Monthly, including the adjustment on the main line

fields.label: Monthly Cost
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Cost price of this product before adjustment. If the product is configurable, the cost price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a Monthly basis.

fields.label: Monthly Cost including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate cost price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a Monthly basis.

fields.label: Monthly Discount (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyDiscountAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate absolute discount on products that are billed on a monthly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Monthly Discount (%)
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Discount applied to a regular product that is billed monthly. If the product is configurable, this is the discount on all sub-lines (e.g., components) that are billed monthly, including the discount on the main line if the main line is billed monthly.

fields.label: Monthly Extended Price incl. sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyExtendedPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Sum of the aggregate extended price of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed monthly, and the unit price of the configurable product, if the configurable product is billed monthly.

fields.label: Monthly Extended Price all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyExtendedPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (extended price = unit price x quantity) of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed monthly.

fields.label: Monthly Margin (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyMarginAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate margin on products that are billed on a Monthly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Monthly Margin (%)
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyMargin_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Margin that is applied to a regular product that is billed Monthly. If the product is configurable, then the Monthly margin field is the adjustment on all sub-lines that are billed Monthly, including the margin on the main line

fields.label: Monthly List including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyPriceBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: CASE( REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c , 'Monthly',  BLANKVALUE(REVVY__Price__c, BLANKVALUE(REVVY__UnitPrice__c, 0))  +  REVVY__MonthlyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c,  REVVY__MonthlyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c)
fields.inlineHelpText: List price of this product before discount. If the product is configurable, the list price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a monthly basis.

fields.label: Monthly List all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate list price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a monthly basis, before any discounts are applied.

fields.label: Monthly Total Unit Price
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyTotalValue_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a monthly basis after discounts have been applied.

fields.label: Monthly Unit Price including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyUnitPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unit price of this product. If the product is configurable, the unit price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a Monthly basis.

fields.label: Monthly Unit Price all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyUnitPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate unit price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a Monthly basis.

fields.label: Monthly Total Value List
fields.name: REVVY__MonthlyValueBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a monthly basis before any discounts are applied.

fields.label: Approval Required
fields.name: REVVY__NeedsApproval__c
fields.inlineHelpText: This flag is set by the system when the workflow suggests an approval is needed for the underlying contract item.

fields.label: One-time Mark-up (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeAdjustment1Absolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate adjustment1 on products that are billed on a one-time basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: One-time Mark-up (%)
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeAdjustment1_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Adjustment that is applied to a regular product that is billed one time. If the product is configurable, then the one time adjustment field is the adjustment on all sub-lines (e.g., the components) that are billed one time plus main line

fields.label: One-time Cost
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Cost price of this product before adjustment. If the product is configurable, the cost  price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a one-time basis.

fields.label: One-time Cost including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate cost price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a one-time basis.

fields.label: One-time Discount (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeDiscountAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate discount on products that are billed on a one-time basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: One-time Discount (%)
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Discount applied to a regular product that is billed one time. If the product is configurable, this is the discount on all sub-lines (e.g., components) that are billed one time, including the discount on the main line if the main line is billed one time.

fields.label: One-time Extended Price incl. sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeExtendedPrice_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: CASE( REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c , 'One Time', BLANKVALUE(REVVY__UnitPrice__c, 0) +  REVVY__OneTimeExtendedPrice_S__c, REVVY__OneTimeExtendedPrice_S__c)
fields.inlineHelpText: Sum of the aggregate extended price of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed one time, and the unit price of the configurable product, if the configurable product is billed one time.

fields.label: One-time Extended Price all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeExtendedPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (extended price = unit price x quantity) of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed one time.

fields.label: One-time Margin (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeMarginAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate margin on products that are billed on a one-time basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: One-time Margin (%)
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeMargin_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Margin that is applied to a regular product that is billed one time. If the product is configurable, then the one time margin field is the adjustment on all sub-lines (e.g., the components) that are billed one time, including the margin on the main line i

fields.label: One-time List including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimePriceBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: CASE( REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c , 'One Time',  BLANKVALUE(REVVY__Price__c, BLANKVALUE(REVVY__UnitPrice__c, 0))  +  REVVY__OneTimePriceBeforeDiscount_S__c,  REVVY__OneTimePriceBeforeDiscount_S__c)
fields.inlineHelpText: List price of this product before discount. If the product is configurable, the list price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a one-time basis.

fields.label: One-time List all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimePriceBeforeDiscount_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate list price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a one-time basis, before any discounts are applied.

fields.label: One-time Total Unit Price
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeTotalValue_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a one-time basis after discounts have been applied.

fields.label: One-time Unit Price
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeUnitPrice_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: CASE( REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c , 'One Time', BLANKVALUE(REVVY__UnitPrice__c, 0) + REVVY__OneTimeUnitPrice_S__c, REVVY__OneTimeUnitPrice_S__c)
fields.inlineHelpText: Unit price of this product. If the product is configurable, the unit price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a one-time basis.

fields.label: One-time Unit Price including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeUnitPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate unit price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a one-time basis.

fields.label: One-time Total List
fields.name: REVVY__OneTimeValueBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a one-time basis before any discounts are applied.

fields.label: Price List Line
fields.name: REVVY__PriceListLine__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID of the Price List Line object used to derive the List Price for this product.

fields.label: List Price
fields.name: REVVY__Price__c
fields.inlineHelpText: List price of product for this contract.

fields.label: Pricing Source
fields.name: REVVY__PricingSource__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Denotes the contract subtype / pricing list ID from medtech

fields.label: Item Configuration ID
fields.name: REVVY__ProductConfig__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID of the model used to configure this product.

fields.label: Qty
fields.name: REVVY__Quantity__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Number of units.

fields.label: Contract Item Position
fields.name: REVVY__RecordNumber__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Position number for this contract item.

fields.label: Services Account
fields.name: REVVY__ServicesAccount__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unique ID of the account that is associated with the contract item.

fields.label: Source Quote Item
fields.name: REVVY__SourceQuoteItem__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Source quote item from which this contract item was created.

fields.label: Status
fields.name: REVVY__Status_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL(REVVY__Status__c, 'Active'),  IF(REVVY__EndDateContract__c < TODAY(), 'Expired', TEXT(REVVY__Status__c)), TEXT(REVVY__Status__c))

fields.label: Status
fields.name: REVVY__Status__c
fields.inlineHelpText: The state of the contract line

fields.label: Term (Months)
fields.name: REVVY__Term__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Number of units.

fields.label: Total List Price
fields.name: REVVY__TotalPrice__c
fields.inlineHelpText: List price multiplied by quantity.

fields.label: Total Value
fields.name: REVVY__TotalValueDisplay_F__c

fields.label: Unit Price
fields.name: REVVY__UnitPrice__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unit price of product (list price less the discount)

fields.label: Vol. Disc. (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__VolDiscAbsolute__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Total volume discount off of list price (e.g., $100 off).

fields.label: Vol. Disc. (%)
fields.name: REVVY__VolDisc__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Percentage volume discount off of list price (e.g., 20% off).

fields.label: Weekly Mark-up (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyAdjustment1Absolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate adjustment1 on products that are billed on a Weekly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Weekly Mark-up (%)
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyAdjustment1_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Adjustment that is applied to a regular product that is billed Weekly. If the product is configurable, then the Weekly adjustment field is the adjustment on all sub-lines (e.g., the components) that are billed Weekly, including the adjustment on the main

fields.label: Weekly Cost
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Cost price of this product before adjustment. If the product is configurable, the cost price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a Weekly basis.

fields.label: Weekly Cost including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate cost price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a Weekly basis.

fields.label: Weekly Discount (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyDiscountAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate discount on products that are billed on a weekly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Weekly Discount (%)
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Discount applied to a regular product that is billed weekly. If the product is configurable, this is the discount on all sub-lines (e.g., components) that are billed weekly, including the discount on the main line if the main line is billed weekly.

fields.label: Weekly Extended Price incl. sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyExtendedPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Sum of the aggregate extended price of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed weekly, and the unit price of the configurable product, if the configurable product is billed weekly.

fields.label: Weekly Extended Price all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyExtendedPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (extended price = unit price x quantity) of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed weekly.

fields.label: Weekly Margin (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyMarginAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate margin on products that are billed on a Weekly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Weekly List including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyPriceBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: CASE( REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c , 'Weekly',  BLANKVALUE(REVVY__Price__c, BLANKVALUE(REVVY__UnitPrice__c, 0))  +  REVVY__WeeklyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c,  REVVY__WeeklyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c)
fields.inlineHelpText: List price of this product before discount. If the product is configurable, the list price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a weekly basis.

fields.label: Weekly List all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate list price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a weekly basis, before any discounts are applied.

fields.label: Weekly Total Unit Price
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyTotalValue_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a weekly basis after discounts have been applied.

fields.label: Weekly Unit Price including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyUnitPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unit price of this product. If the product is configurable, the unit price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a Weekly basis.

fields.label: Weekly Unit Price all sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyUnitPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate unit price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a Weekly basis.

fields.label: Weekly Total List
fields.name: REVVY__WeeklyValueBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a weekly basis before any discounts are applied.

fields.label: Weekly Margin (%)
fields.name: REVVY__Weekly_Margin_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Margin that is applied to a regular product that is billed Weekly. If the product is configurable, then the Weekly margin field is the adjustment on all sub-lines (e.g., the components) that are billed Weekly, including the margin on the main line if the

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyAdjustment1Absolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate adjustment1 on products that are billed on a Yearly basis, shown in currency.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyAdjustment1_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Adjustment that is applied to a regular product that is billed Yearly. If the product is configurable, then the Yearly adjustment field is the adjustment on all sub-lines (e.g., the components) that are billed Yearly, including the adjustment on the main

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Cost price of this product before adjustment. If the product is configurable, the cost price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a Yearly basis.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyCostPriceBeforeAdjustment_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate cost price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a Yearly basis.

fields.label: Yearly Discount (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__YearlyDiscountAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate discount on products that are billed on a yearly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Yearly Discount (%)
fields.name: REVVY__YearlyDiscount_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Discount applied to a regular product that is billed yearly. If the product is configurable, this is the discount on all sub-lines (e.g., components) that are billed yearly, including the discount on the main line if the main line is billed yearly.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyExtendedPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Sum of the aggregate extended price of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed yearly, and the unit price of the configurable product, if the configurable product is billed yearly.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyExtendedPrice_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (extended price = unit price x quantity) of all components of a configurable product, where the components are billed yearly.

fields.label: Yearly Margin (Abs)
fields.name: REVVY__YearlyMarginAbsolute_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate margin on products that are billed on a Yearly basis, shown in currency.

fields.label: Yearly Margin (%)
fields.name: REVVY__YearlyMarginF__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Margin that is applied to a regular product that is billed Yearly. If the product is configurable, then the Yearly margin field is the adjustment on all sub-lines (e.g., the components) that are billed Yearly, including the margin on the main line if the

fields.label: Yearly List including sub-lines
fields.name: REVVY__YearlyPriceBeforeDiscount_F__c
fields.calculatedFormula: CASE( REVVY__BillingFrequency_WF__c , 'Yearly',  BLANKVALUE(REVVY__Price__c, BLANKVALUE(REVVY__UnitPrice__c, 0))  +  REVVY__YearlyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c,  REVVY__YearlyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c)
fields.inlineHelpText: List price of this product before discount. If the product is configurable, the list price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a yearly basis.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyPriceBeforeDiscount_S__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate list price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a yearly basis, before any discounts are applied.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyTotalValue_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate extended price (unit price x quantity) of all products that are billed on a yearly basis after discounts have been applied.

fields.name: REVVY__YearlyUnitPrice_F__c
fields.inlineHelpText: Unit price of this product. If the product is configurable, the unit price includes all sub-lines that are billed on a Yearly basis.

fields.inlineHelpText: Aggregate unit price of all sub-lines in a configurable product that are billed on a Yearly basis.
